function.name: showErrorDialog
function.description: Shows a message dialog with the specified title, message and a customizable set of buttons.
function.summary: Shows a message dialog with the specified title, message and a customizable set of buttons.
function.sample: //show dialog var thePressedButton = plugins.dialogs.showErrorDialog('Title', 'Value not allowed','OK');

function.name: showInfoDialog
function.description: Shows a message dialog with the specified title, message and a customizable set of buttons.
function.summary: Shows a message dialog with the specified title, message and a customizable set of buttons.
function.sample: //show dialog var thePressedButton = plugins.dialogs.showInfoDialog('Title', 'Value not allowed','OK');

function.name: showInputDialog
function.description: Shows an input dialog where the user can enter data. Returns the entered data, or nothing when canceled.
function.summary: Shows an input dialog where the user can enter data.
function.sample: //show input dialog ,returns nothing when canceled var typedInput = plugins.dialogs.showInputDialog('Specify','Your name');

function.name: showQuestionDialog
function.description: Shows a message dialog with the specified title, message and a customizable set of buttons.
function.summary: Shows a message dialog with the specified title, message and a customizable set of buttons.

function.name: showSelectDialog
function.description: Shows a selection dialog, where the user can select an entry from a list of options. Returns the selected entry, or nothing when canceled.
function.summary: Shows a selection dialog, where the user can select an entry from a list of options.

function.name: showWarningDialog
function.description: Shows a message dialog with the specified title, message and a customizable set of buttons.
function.summary: Shows a message dialog with the specified title, message and a customizable set of buttons.
